intent.user_query: What is the monthly sales trend (total revenue) for the last 12 months?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS SaleMonth, SUM(TotalPrice) AS MonthlyRevenue FROM fitness_db.Sales WHERE SaleDate BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(CURRENT_DATE, -12) AND CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

arguments.sql: SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS SaleMonth, SUM(TotalPrice) AS MonthlyRevenue FROM fitness_db.Sales WHERE SaleDate BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(CURRENT_DATE, -12) AND CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
